price: Ese twaba twarabahaye igitabo mbere yayo (Qur’an) bakaba ari cyo bihambiraho (bashingiraho ibyo bavuga)?
arabic: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسۡتَمۡسِكُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: am ātaynāhum kitāban min qablihi fahum bihi mus'tamsikūna
